list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the thick white or pale yellow fatty liquid which rises to the top when milk is left to stand and which can be eaten as an accompaniment to desserts or used as a cooking ingredient.
a thick liquid or semisolid cosmetic or medical preparation applied to the skin.
the very best of a group of people or things.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the paper's readership is the cream of American society
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Độc giả của tờ giấy là kem của xã hội Mỹ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a very pale yellow or off-white color.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the dress is available in white or cream
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc váy có sẵn màu trắng hoặc kem

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: work (two or more ingredients, typically butter and sugar) together to form a creamy paste.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you cream the butter first and then add the egg yolks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn bôi kem bơ trước rồi thêm lòng đỏ trứng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: rub a cosmetic cream into (the skin).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Madge was creaming her face in front of the mirror
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Madge đang làm kem mặt trước gương
